description: Detects execution of Impacket's psexec.py. Author: Bhabesh Raj. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Impacket PsExec Execution
query: (winlog.channel:"Security" AND winlog.event_id:"5145" AND winlog.event_data.ShareName:\\\*\\IPC$ AND winlog.event_data.RelativeTargetName:(*RemCom_stdint* OR *RemCom_stdoutt* OR *RemCom_stderrt*))
